type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Base Enchantment

---


[Item Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/base_enchantment).

Checks the level of an enchantment on an item based purely on item nbt.

Type ID: `apugli:base_enchantment`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:base_enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:fortune",
    "calculation": "max",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 3
}
```
This example checks if the item has a Fortune level of III or higher based on nbt alone. This does not count the `apugli:modify_enchantment_level` power or any other non nbt enchantment level modifications.

enchantment.description: The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest, e.g. `minecraft:protection`.
enchantment.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest, e.g. `minecraft:protection`.

comparison.description: How to compare the enchantment level to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How to compare the enchantment level to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the enchantment level against.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the enchantment level against.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Base Enchantment (Item Condition Type) date: 2023-06-07

Base Enchantment

Item Condition Type.

Checks the level of an enchantment on an item based purely on item nbt.

Type ID: apugli:base_enchantment

Fields

Field Type Default Description
enchantment Identifier The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest, e.g. minecraft:protection.
comparison Comparison ">=" How to compare the enchantment level to the specified value.
compare_to Integer The value to compare the enchantment level against.

Example

"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:base_enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:fortune",
    "calculation": "max",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 3
}

This example checks if the item has a Fortune level of III or higher based on nbt alone. This does not count the apugli:modify_enchantment_level power or any other non nbt enchantment level modifications.
